page.title: 07Games Children Play
page.content: In the 1980's children still play games that have been popular for years such as hopscotch, hide and seek and skipping. Ball games are also played like rounders, cricket and tenis. Football is usually played by boys on any available open space in teams of any size. Netball is a game usually played by girls. Games are also played indoors. Electronic games have become very popular in the last few years with over half the families of 10/11 year old children owning computers. Some games can be attached to the T.V. while others are hand held. Cards are played such as snap, beat your neighbour and chase the lady. Some families play board games like Cluedo and Snakes and Ladders. A popular, more active, game is Table Tennis.
